Title: Places a moratorium on selling property tax warrants for the period of the COVID-19 state of emergency
Summary: Places a moratorium on municipalities selling property tax warrants to private companies for the period of the COVID-19 state of emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to placing a moratorium on selling property tax warrants to private companies for the period of the COVID-19 state of emergency; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
